Question: Doctech HK Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Doctech HK Limited

Product 1
- 3D Integrated Circuit (3DIC) packing using nano-twin copper material
- Core focus on nt-Cu material for redistribution layers, Cu interconnects, and micro-pillar for consumer electronics
- Innovating scalable and novel nt-Cu for low-power consumption and transferability
- Promising Cu-Cu bonding technology for future hybrid Cu-Cu bonding of monolithic three-dimensional ICs packing
